headline: How Tech Saved Chinaâ€™s Economy
abstract: To outsiders, China may seem like a surveillance state. But tech has fueled growth and helped stave off recession.
lead_paragraph: Landing in Shanghai recently, I found myself in the middle of a tech revolution remarkable in its sweep. The passport scanner automatically addresses visitors in their native tongues. Digital payment apps have replaced cash. Outsiders trying to use paper money get blank stares from store clerks.
